div.p: PCS Varsity Girls Basketball Team after Section V D1 title win.

span.br: Pavilion Central Schools closed until further notice.

span.span: lease be patient as we try to navigate this unprecedented situation. We are working with a very limited staff to ensure everyone's safety.
